item.title: How small teams can implement data-informed learning decisions without heavy infrastructure
item.description: Start by tracking one meaningful metric like time-to-competency or skill application frequency. Create simple dashboards using free tools like Confluence pages or GitHub repositories. When you review learning activities against performance data, you'll quickly identify which approaches actually move the needle.
